document.full_text: 'priscilla queen of the desert,' a hyperactively splashy musical, wants so desperately to give audiences a good time that the results are oddly enervating.
document.title: theater review | 'priscilla queen of the desert': with song in heart, pompoms on head
lines_and_colors: 'priscilla queen of the desert,' a hyperactively splashy musical, wants so desperately to give audiences a good time that the results are oddly enervating.
